flawed_nl_solution:
Bruce has 20 more legos than Kent who has 40 so Bruce has 20+40 = <<20+40=70>>70 legos
Simon has 20% more legos than Bruce who has 70 legos so that's 0.2*70 = <<20*0.01*70=14>>14 more legos
20% more is 14 legos and Bruce has 70 so Simon has 14+70 = 84 legos
#### 84

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
